item.title: Top Democrat Jeffries says if government shuts down it's because Republicans want that
item.description: House Minority Leader Hakeem Jeffries' comments come days before the government is set to shut down unless lawmakers reach a deal.

item.title: Health providers could lose $32 billion if ACA credits at center of shutdown fight expire
item.description: Democrats demand that any stopgap funding measure to keep the federal government open include an extension of the enhanced Obamacare subsidies credits...

item.title: Trump OMB orders preparation for mass firings of federal workers if government shuts down
item.description: The warning could ratchet up pressure on Congress to strike a deal to avert a government shutdown.

item.title: Democrats dig in on health care demands with government shutdown days away
item.description: Democrats say any stopgap funding to avoid a government shutdown must extend enhanced Obamacare tax credits, which are set to expire at the end of the...

item.title: Ken Griffin knocks Trump's corporate deals, says 'all of us lose' when government starts picking winners
item.description: Griffin said the government giving "favor" to large and well-connected companies is "not the American story."
